coreQueryPageProvider.name: agenda_list_query
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE dc:title LIKE '?' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:mixinType='Agenda' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: agenda_list_events_query
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'Schedulable' AND ecm:fulltext.dc:title LIKE '?' AND ecm:ancestorId = '?' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: agenda_list_events_with_date_query
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * From Document WHERE ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:mixinType = 'Schedulable' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND (vevent:dtstart > TIMESTAMP ? OR vevent:dtend < TIMESTAMP ?)
